name: Electronic Form Loader File
summary: An FRL file is a form created by FormFlow, a now-discontinued program designed for creating and managing electronic forms. It contains information about a form in the Electronic Form Loader (FRL) format, including various fields and layouts for inputting and submitting data. FRL forms are typically used for tasks like surveys, applications, or other types of data collection.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
